casebody.data:
Anthony G. VARCHETTA
v.
COMMISSIONER OF CORRECTION Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided May 3, 2017

Justine Miller, assigned counsel, in support of the petition.

Peter A. McShane, state's attorney, in opposition.

The petitioner Anthony G. Varchetta's petition for certification for appeal from the Appellate Court, 171 Conn. App. 902, 155 A.3d 831 (2017), is denied.
